Name: Climax Heroines
About the game: Your hometown is in trouble! Chinami, a warrior and her childhood friend, Haruka learn that the most powerful witch in their old hometown, Morgana has gone crazy. Morgana has been digging inside of her home, into deep catacombs and thus causing monsters to come crawling out of it. Many people have tried to go and stop this monster invasion but no one has come back. Craft various weapons and armor as you make your way across each level of a dungeon with randomized loot.
Meta Title: Climax Heroines: Mar 1, 2022, Tuomo Laine and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Climax Heroines? Check out the release date (Mar 1, 2022), developer insights from Tuomo Laine, and a complete game summary.
